document.full_text: warner music group, which is being bought by billionaire len blavatnik's access industries, reported a narrower-than-expected quarterly loss, helped by a 9 percent jump in digital revenue.
document.title: warner music beats estimates on digital sales
lines_and_colors: warner music group, which is being bought by billionaire len blavatnik's access industries, reported a narrower-than-expected quarterly loss, helped by a 9 percent jump in digital revenue.
